trans-unit.source: Enables event tracking for a component.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute"></xref> class, enabling event tracking.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute"></xref>类，并启用事件跟踪。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor enables event tracking.
trans-unit.target: 默认构造函数启用事件跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute"></xref> class, optionally disabling event tracking.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.EventTrackingEnabledAttribute"></xref>类，并可以选择禁用事件跟踪。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enable event tracking; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要启用事件跟踪;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the Value property, which indicates whether tracking is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示是否已启用跟踪的 Value 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if tracking is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已启用跟踪;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
